text: #FYI  If you suffer from #anaphylaxis drinking tonic water or Canada Dry’s Bitter lemon (both contain Quinine), then you most likely have #G6Pd deficiency & need to avoid #Chloroquine #ChloroquinePhosphate & #Hydroxychloroquine meds during #COVID19 #CoronavirusPandemic https://t.co/IDBLwENGr3
